chunk:
Isntree C-Niacin Toning Ampoule Face Serum, 1.69 fl oz / 50ml

Brand: Isntree

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Hippophae rhamnoides fruit extract, butylene glycol, pentylene glycol, water, glycerin, betaine, niacinamide, propanediol, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, melia azadirachta flower extract, melia azadirachta leaf extract, cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) fruit extract, physalis alkekengi fruit extract, sodium hyaluronate, dipotassium

barbadensis leaf extract, melia azadirachta flower extract, melia azadirachta leaf extract, cucurbita pepo (pumpkin) fruit extract, physalis alkekengi fruit extract, sodium hyaluronate, dipotassium glycyrrhizate, ocimum sanctum leaf extract, beta-glucan, curcuma longa (turmeric) root extract, corallina officinalis extract, brassica oleracea

fruit extract, sodium hyaluronate, dipotassium glycyrrhizate, ocimum sanctum leaf extract, beta-glucan, curcuma longa (turmeric) root extract, corallina officinalis extract, brassica oleracea italica (broccoli) extract, coccinia indica fruit extract, moringa oleifera seed oil, panthenol, allantoin, bioflavonoids, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid, sodium

officinalis extract, brassica oleracea italica (broccoli) extract, coccinia indica fruit extract, moringa oleifera seed oil, panthenol, allantoin, bioflavonoids, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid, sodium polyacrylate, tocopherol, polysorbate 80, 1,2-hexanediol, ethyl hexanediol, ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer, zanthoxylum piperitum fruit

bioflavonoids, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid, sodium polyacrylate, tocopherol, polysorbate 80, 1,2-hexanediol, ethyl hexanediol, ammonium acryloyldimethyltaurate/vp copolymer, zanthoxylum piperitum fruit extract, pulsatilla koreana extract, usnea barbata (lichen) extract, 3-o-ethyl ascorbic acid.

Directions: 1. Dispense a moderate amount and apply to target areas or the entire face. 2. Gently pat for better absorption. Recommended: If your skin appears dull and dark and lackluster If you are not confident without makeup due to blemish If you feel dryness from general whitening products
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
